lexUnit.name: bash.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: usu. with modifier a party or social event.

sentence.text: It could be a unique occasion ( possibly hilarious ) and a fitting bash to celebrate a decade has seen trainer wear break out on a massive scale .
And the traditional Conservative chairman 's bash at Central Office may have to go on without the chairman : Chris Patten , busy in Bath , may not get back in time to drink with his team .
The twelve hour bash also features Otis B. Driftwood , Marilyn Middleton Pollock from Chicago and the Real Ale and Thunder Band .

Although the venue is not as packed as the previous night 's ( happy ) Birthday Party bash , those who have ventured out tonight are a partisan faction in regulation red ` Eat Yourself Whole " shirts .
Labour 's bash will be at 4 Millbank , where it has been holding its morning press conferences .
All of you couch potatoes who were inspired by the Olympics to take more exercise in future , what about having a bash at the New York Marathon and raising funds for charity as well ?

BRASH comedienne Roseanne Arnold was for once left speechless when husband Tom handed her a $1 million ( £655,000 ) set of diamond and emerald jewels at a star-studded 40th birthday bash at Beverly Hills Hotel .
ACTOR Bruce Willis gave wife Demi Moore a star-studded 30th birthday bash -- 30,000ft up in the air .
Rachel 's former fiance revealed that he thinks the health-conscious Vogue model was duped into taking the drug at the bash at Wavertree Recreation Club in Liverpool .
` HIS racket 's this size , " says Lauren Hutton at Jimmy Connors ' 40th birthday bash .
U2 LAST night unveiled their stunning new video Interference at a spectacular bash at London 's Planetarium …
They got out a bag containing balloons and presents for Harry 's birthday bash , which will be held without his parents .
The all-night bash on August 29 will have three separate arenas , and the main stage , inside Europe 's largest circus tent , will feature the original film set from Blade Runner .
Previous birthday bashes at Balmoral for the Queen 's sister have been marked by Scottish dancing and champagne .
The other day I was in a line-up at a charity bash and next to me were Simon and Yasmin Le Bon .
The four-day bash will end with a series of activities coinciding with National Music Day .
An industrial tribunal in Liverpool heard that Fiona Shearer , 23 , and her boyfriend Kenneth Dodd , 29 , were dismissed five days after the private bash on August 28 last year .
Bowled over : Supermarket staff plan a marathon bowling bash at Megabowl on Sefton Retail Park , Netherton on November 15 .
